<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Discordant Voice](/Feats.aspx?ID=1661) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[_inspire courage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=386)

</column>

---

Your [_inspire courage_](/Spells.aspx?ID=386) lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations. While your allies are affected by your inspire courage, their weapon Strikes and unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d6 sonic damage.
name: Discordant Voice
